description: Can't seem to find a way to start a new game. Tried everything. Have to shutdown and restart the app. Am I missing something? Game is OK otherwise.
This is what I was looking for. Nice app to improve words.
Too many words have been left out of the English words list. Even the word "RARE" was not accepted when the letters were clearly available in the grid.
All the options are awesome. The usability of typing is great - the way it shows how your letters are forming words or not.
I love this game. It's equally engrossing and frustrating. I always seem to miss very obvious words. Love it.

Would be great if it worked properly... so many words missing: GREEKS, APRIL in this session alone. All words that are in SCOWL, so I don't know how the author can claim to be using it for word checking. The high scores are also close to meaningless, a percentage is the only way that makes any sense (80 points from a possible 150 is much better than 100 points from a possible 370).
It uses a Hebrew dictionary. So no one who is not fluent in Hebrew will get more than 30% of the highest possible score.
summary: Don't bother... unless you're fluent in Hebrew
